questions.question: Which of the following apparatus is not used in shrinkage limit testing?

explanations.a: The porcelain evaporating dish is used in the shrinkage limit test.
explanations.b: Two glass plates are used in the shrinkage limit test to remove excess volume of mercury or soil.
explanations.c: Screws are not used in any way in the shrinkage limit experiment.
explanations.d: Stainless steel shrinking dish is used to create the dry soil pat in the shrinkage limit experiment.

questions.question: The Swedish agriculturist who derived the consistency limits is ________________ .

explanations.a: The Swedish agriculturist who derived the  consistency limit is Atterberg, thus Westergaard is an incorrect option.
explanations.b: The Swedish agriculturist who derived the  consistency limit is Atterberg, thus Nikola Tesla is an incorrect option.
explanations.c: The Swedish agriculturist who derived the  consistency limit is Atterberg, thus Boussinesq is an incorrect option.
explanations.d: The Swedish agriculturist who derived the  consistency limit is Atterberg.

questions.question: Which of the following is not considered as one of the states in Atterberg's limit?

explanations.a: In the Atterberg’s consistency limits, the first limit range is the solid state.
explanations.b: In the Atterberg’s consistency limits, gaseous state is not included.
explanations.c: In the Atterberg’s consistency limits, the second limit range is the semi-solid state.
explanations.d: In the Atterberg’s consistency limits, the last limit range is the liquid state.

questions.question: The atterberg limit which differentiates between semi-solid and plastic state is ________________ .

explanations.a: According to Atterberg's Consistency limit, the plastic limit differentiates between semi-solid and plastic states.
explanations.b: According to Atterberg's Consistency limit, Shrinkage limit differentiates between solid and semi-solid states.
explanations.c: According to Atterberg's Consistency limit, Liquid limit differentiates between plastic and liquid states.
explanations.d: According to Atterberg's Consistency limit, the plastic limit differentiates between semi-solid and plastic states.

questions.question: ________________  code is used for the conduction of Shrinkage limit test.

explanations.a: IS 2720-1972(part IV) is the codebook used for the conduction of shrinkage limit tests and the code book was not published in 1974.
explanations.b: IS 2720-1972(part IV) is the codebook used for the conduction of shrinkage limit test.
explanations.c: IS 2720-1972(part IV) is the codebook used for the conduction of shrinkage limit tests. IS 2721 - 1972 (part II) is not the code book for the Shrinkage limit test.
explanations.d: IS 2720-1972(part IV) is the codebook used for the conduction of shrinkage limit tests. IS 2724 - 1972 (part IV) is not the code book for the Shrinkage limit test.
